column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We preordered our pizza while waiting in line
column2: definitely reccommended if you are in a time crunch.  We were on our way to the train station
column3: and this saved us at least 20 minutes of waiting at the table.  Service was great
column4: and the kids even loved their meals of burgers
column6: and chicken.  A definite winner!  I might even try ordering one to be shipped to Michigan someday.
